content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":258292,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王の子は殺す、襲ってきます","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King's child will be killed, they will attack."},{"lineNumber":258293,"originalJapaneseLine":"捨て台詞を残して魔王討伐隊は立ち去る","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King's extermination squad leaves behind a parting remark and departs."},{"lineNumber":258294,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\t\tなんとか説得したい","translatedEnglishLine":"I somehow want to persuade them."},{"lineNumber":258295,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\t\t追いかけます","translatedEnglishLine":"I will chase after them."},{"lineNumber":258296,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t逃げる魔王討伐隊","translatedEnglishLine":"The Demon King's extermination squad is fleeing."},{"lineNumber":258297,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tウズメが一人残り襲ってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Uzume stays behind alone and attacks."},{"lineNumber":258298,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tエールがウズメの記憶を直す","translatedEnglishLine":"Eru fixes Uzume's memories."},{"lineNumber":258299,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tウズメが仲間になる","translatedEnglishLine":"Uzume becomes an ally."},{"lineNumber":258300,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリーザス首都に到着する","translatedEnglishLine":"They arrive at the capital of Leazas."},{"lineNumber":258301,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tエールがリーダーになる","translatedEnglishLine":"Eru becomes the leader."},{"lineNumber":258302,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリーザス城に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"They enter Leazas Castle."},{"lineNumber":258303,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリア王女と謁見、母からの手紙を渡す","translatedEnglishLine":"They have an audience with Princess Ria and hand over a letter from her mother."},{"lineNumber":258304,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tザンスが登場する","translatedEnglishLine":"Zhans appears."},{"lineNumber":258305,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t３日後出発と勝手に仕切る","translatedEnglishLine":"He arbitrarily decides departure will be in three days."},{"lineNumber":258306,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリア、貴方の部下を紹介するわね・・（リアがザンスにエール達を紹介する","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria says, 'I will introduce your subordinates...' (Ria introduces Eru and others to Zhans)."},{"lineNumber":258307,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tエール君、法王クルックーの子よ。会ったのは始めてよね、私もクルックーにダーリンの子が","translatedEnglishLine":"Eru-kun, you are the child of Pope Krukku. This is our first meeting, I just found out that Krukku has a darling's child."},{"lineNumber":258308,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tいるなんて今さっき知った所、","translatedEnglishLine":"I just learned that a moment ago."},{"lineNumber":258309,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tで、リセットちゃんはよく知っているよね。相変わらず小さくて可愛い","translatedEnglishLine":"And, you know Reset-chan well. She’s still small and cute as always."},{"lineNumber":258310,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tＩＦ．ウズメ","translatedEnglishLine":"If: Uzume."},{"lineNumber":258311,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　ウズメちゃん、行方不明になっていたのに発見されたよ。よかったわ。かなみも一安心ね","translatedEnglishLine":"Uzume-chan, you were missing but have been found. That’s good. Kanami can breathe a sigh of relief too."},{"lineNumber":258312,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　あっ、お母さんには私から連絡入れておいてあげるわ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, I’ll contact your mother myself."},{"lineNumber":258313,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　きっと泣いて喜んでかけつけてくるかも。","translatedEnglishLine":"She might cry tears of joy and rush over."},{"lineNumber":258314,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tえーと、後は・・・その他の護衛よ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Umm, and then... the other guards."},{"lineNumber":258315,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　長田君・・おーい、紹介なしかよーおれらー","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun... hey, aren’t you going to introduce us?"},{"lineNumber":258316,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":258317,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tザンスは値踏みするように一人一人見ていく\t\t","translatedEnglishLine":"Zhans sizes up each person one by one."},{"lineNumber":258318,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tエール女\t\tじろじろと見てきます。スカートをめくります、エロく傍若無人なザンスの奮起を出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Female Eru: He stares incessantly, lifts up her skirt, showing Zhans' lewd and overbearing spirit."},{"lineNumber":258319,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tリセット\t\tあいからわず小さいままだな、つまらん。ランスと同じくロリコンでは無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset: Still as small as ever, boring. Like Rance, I’m not a lolicon."},{"lineNumber":258320,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\tウズメ\t\t\t敵に洗脳されて使われていただって、おおかたその身体を使ってサービスしてたんだろうな","translatedEnglishLine":"Uzume: She was brainwashed by the enemy and used, probably servicing them with that body."},{"lineNumber":258321,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\t\t\tあんたこそ、まだ童貞なのかい？　むかっ、違うわー","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you still a virgin? Ugh, that’s not true!"},{"lineNumber":258322,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t長田、ロッキー、ドッス、ワッスは無視","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata, Rocky, Doss, Wass are ignored."},{"lineNumber":258323,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔王ランス退治はいずれ俺がしないといけない宿命と思っていた、まぁ予定より少し早くなったが","translatedEnglishLine":"I thought it was my destiny to defeat Demon King Rance eventually, well, it just happened a little earlier than planned."},{"lineNumber":258324,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tやってやるさ","translatedEnglishLine":"I’ll do it."},{"lineNumber":258325,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tお前達、せいぜい俺の足をひっぱらないようにがんばってくれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"You all, do your best not to hold me back."},{"lineNumber":258326,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tザンスは完全にリーダー気分、準備もあるから旅立ちは３日後だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zhans is completely in leader mode; since there’s preparation, departure is in three days."},{"lineNumber":258327,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそれまでは、ゆっくり休んでいてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"Until then, rest well."},{"lineNumber":258328,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":258329,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tリアがザンスにランスに渡して欲しいとラブレターを渡す","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria gives Zhans a love letter to pass on to Rance."},{"lineNumber":258330,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tもう、いい加減歳なんだから、こんなマネするなよ、とっくに捨てられたのを理解しろよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, you’re getting old, stop doing things like this. Understand that you were discarded long ago."},{"lineNumber":258331,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tと文句を言われる","translatedEnglishLine":"She complains."},{"lineNumber":258332,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまだまだ子供ね、大人の愛は分からないようね","translatedEnglishLine":"You’re still a child; you don’t understand adult love."},{"lineNumber":258333,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t※エール女","translatedEnglishLine":"*Female Eru."},{"lineNumber":258334,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその夜、ザンスが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"That night, Zhans appears."},{"lineNumber":258335,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺の女になれ宣言","translatedEnglishLine":"Declaration: Become my woman."},{"lineNumber":258336,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t※エール男","translatedEnglishLine":"*Male Eru."},{"lineNumber":258337,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその夜、ザンスが現れる","translatedEnglishLine":"That night, Zhans appears."},{"lineNumber":258338,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t酒飲み","translatedEnglishLine":"Drinking alcohol."},{"lineNumber":258339,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tザンスと長田君の話","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Zhans and Nagata-kun."},{"lineNumber":258340,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t俺達が行く理由、才能限界値","translatedEnglishLine":"The reason we are going, the talent limit."},{"lineNumber":258341,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t一般人は必要無い","translatedEnglishLine":"Ordinary people are not needed."},{"lineNumber":258342,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t朝、出発する","translatedEnglishLine":"They depart in the morning."},{"lineNumber":258343,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tオーブはスケールの街にある","translatedEnglishLine":"The orb is in the town of Scale."},{"lineNumber":258344,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t村人が魔獣カースの退治を直訴している","translatedEnglishLine":"Villagers are directly petitioning to exterminate the magical beast Curse."},{"lineNumber":258345,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t廃墟となったスケールに到着","translatedEnglishLine":"They arrive at the ruined town of Scale."},{"lineNumber":258346,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦争終結を認めない魔軍が立て籠もっている","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army, refusing to accept the war's end, is holed up."},{"lineNumber":258347,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tザンスは自分がリーダーと思っていたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Zhans thought he was the leader,"},{"lineNumber":258348,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tエールがリーダーと知り驚く","translatedEnglishLine":"but is surprised to learn that Eru is the leader."},{"lineNumber":258349,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t最期にはエールをリーダーと認める","translatedEnglishLine":"In the end, he acknowledges Eru as the leader."},{"lineNumber":258350,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time,"},{"lineNumber":258351,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t街中で立て籠もる魔物将軍ダルソン","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General Darson is barricaded inside the town."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子は殺す、襲ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's child will be killed, they will attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨て台詞を残して魔王討伐隊は立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's extermination squad leaves behind a parting remark and departs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか説得したい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I somehow want to persuade them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will chase after them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げる魔王討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's extermination squad is fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメが一人残り襲ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume stays behind alone and attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがウズメの記憶を直す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eru fixes Uzume's memories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメが仲間になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume becomes an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス首都に到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the capital of Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがリーダーになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eru becomes the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They enter Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア王女と謁見、母からの手紙を渡す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have an audience with Princess Ria and hand over a letter from her mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスが登場する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３日後出発と勝手に仕切る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He arbitrarily decides departure will be in three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、貴方の部下を紹介するわね・・（リアがザンスにエール達を紹介する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria says, 'I will introduce your subordinates...' (Ria introduces Eru and others to Zhans).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール君、法王クルックーの子よ。会ったのは始めてよね、私もクルックーにダーリンの子が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eru-kun, you are the child of Pope Krukku. This is our first meeting, I just found out that Krukku has a darling's child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いるなんて今さっき知った所、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just learned that a moment ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、リセットちゃんはよく知っているよね。相変わらず小さくて可愛い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, you know Reset-chan well. She’s still small and cute as always.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．ウズメ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If: Uzume.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメちゃん、行方不明になっていたのに発見されたよ。よかったわ。かなみも一安心ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume-chan, you were missing but have been found. That’s good. Kanami can breathe a sigh of relief too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、お母さんには私から連絡入れておいてあげるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I’ll contact your mother myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと泣いて喜んでかけつけてくるかも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She might cry tears of joy and rush over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、後は・・・その他の護衛よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Umm, and then... the other guards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君・・おーい、紹介なしかよーおれらー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun... hey, aren’t you going to introduce us?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは値踏みするように一人一人見ていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans sizes up each person one by one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール女		じろじろと見てきます。スカートをめくります、エロく傍若無人なザンスの奮起を出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Female Eru: He stares incessantly, lifts up her skirt, showing Zhans' lewd and overbearing spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット		あいからわず小さいままだな、つまらん。ランスと同じくロリコンでは無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset: Still as small as ever, boring. Like Rance, I’m not a lolicon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメ			敵に洗脳されて使われていただって、おおかたその身体を使ってサービスしてたんだろうな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume: She was brainwashed by the enemy and used, probably servicing them with that body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたこそ、まだ童貞なのかい？　むかっ、違うわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you still a virgin? Ugh, that’s not true!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田、ロッキー、ドッス、ワッスは無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata, Rocky, Doss, Wass are ignored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランス退治はいずれ俺がしないといけない宿命と思っていた、まぁ予定より少し早くなったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was my destiny to defeat Demon King Rance eventually, well, it just happened a little earlier than planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やってやるさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達、せいぜい俺の足をひっぱらないようにがんばってくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all, do your best not to hold me back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは完全にリーダー気分、準備もあるから旅立ちは３日後だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans is completely in leader mode; since there’s preparation, departure is in three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでは、ゆっくり休んでいてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, rest well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアがザンスにランスに渡して欲しいとラブレターを渡す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria gives Zhans a love letter to pass on to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、いい加減歳なんだから、こんなマネするなよ、とっくに捨てられたのを理解しろよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you’re getting old, stop doing things like this. Understand that you were discarded long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と文句を言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She complains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ子供ね、大人の愛は分からないようね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re still a child; you don’t understand adult love.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エール女
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Female Eru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、ザンスが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, Zhans appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女になれ宣言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Declaration: Become my woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エール男
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Male Eru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、ザンスが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, Zhans appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒飲み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Drinking alcohol.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスと長田君の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Zhans and Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達が行く理由、才能限界値
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason we are going, the talent limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一般人は必要無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ordinary people are not needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝、出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They depart in the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブはスケールの街にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The orb is in the town of Scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人が魔獣カースの退治を直訴している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Villagers are directly petitioning to exterminate the magical beast Curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 廃墟となったスケールに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the ruined town of Scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争終結を認めない魔軍が立て籠もっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, refusing to accept the war's end, is holed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは自分がリーダーと思っていたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans thought he was the leader,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがリーダーと知り驚く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but is surprised to learn that Eru is the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期にはエールをリーダーと認める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, he acknowledges Eru as the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中で立て籠もる魔物将軍ダルソン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Darson is barricaded inside the town.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子は殺す、襲ってきます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's child will be killed, they will attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捨て台詞を残して魔王討伐隊は立ち去る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's extermination squad leaves behind a parting remark and departs.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとか説得したい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I somehow want to persuade them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 追いかけます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will chase after them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げる魔王討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King's extermination squad is fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメが一人残り襲ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume stays behind alone and attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがウズメの記憶を直す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eru fixes Uzume's memories.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメが仲間になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume becomes an ally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス首都に到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the capital of Leazas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがリーダーになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eru becomes the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They enter Leazas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア王女と謁見、母からの手紙を渡す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have an audience with Princess Ria and hand over a letter from her mother.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスが登場する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３日後出発と勝手に仕切る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He arbitrarily decides departure will be in three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、貴方の部下を紹介するわね・・（リアがザンスにエール達を紹介する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria says, 'I will introduce your subordinates...' (Ria introduces Eru and others to Zhans).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール君、法王クルックーの子よ。会ったのは始めてよね、私もクルックーにダーリンの子が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eru-kun, you are the child of Pope Krukku. This is our first meeting, I just found out that Krukku has a darling's child.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いるなんて今さっき知った所、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just learned that a moment ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、リセットちゃんはよく知っているよね。相変わらず小さくて可愛い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And, you know Reset-chan well. She’s still small and cute as always.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＩＦ．ウズメ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If: Uzume.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメちゃん、行方不明になっていたのに発見されたよ。よかったわ。かなみも一安心ね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume-chan, you were missing but have been found. That’s good. Kanami can breathe a sigh of relief too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、お母さんには私から連絡入れておいてあげるわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, I’ll contact your mother myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと泣いて喜んでかけつけてくるかも。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She might cry tears of joy and rush over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーと、後は・・・その他の護衛よ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Umm, and then... the other guards.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君・・おーい、紹介なしかよーおれらー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun... hey, aren’t you going to introduce us?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは値踏みするように一人一人見ていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans sizes up each person one by one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エール女		じろじろと見てきます。スカートをめくります、エロく傍若無人なザンスの奮起を出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Female Eru: He stares incessantly, lifts up her skirt, showing Zhans' lewd and overbearing spirit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセット		あいからわず小さいままだな、つまらん。ランスと同じくロリコンでは無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset: Still as small as ever, boring. Like Rance, I’m not a lolicon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウズメ			敵に洗脳されて使われていただって、おおかたその身体を使ってサービスしてたんだろうな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume: She was brainwashed by the enemy and used, probably servicing them with that body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたこそ、まだ童貞なのかい？　むかっ、違うわー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you still a virgin? Ugh, that’s not true!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田、ロッキー、ドッス、ワッスは無視
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata, Rocky, Doss, Wass are ignored.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランス退治はいずれ俺がしないといけない宿命と思っていた、まぁ予定より少し早くなったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it was my destiny to defeat Demon King Rance eventually, well, it just happened a little earlier than planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やってやるさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll do it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前達、せいぜい俺の足をひっぱらないようにがんばってくれ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You all, do your best not to hold me back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは完全にリーダー気分、準備もあるから旅立ちは３日後だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans is completely in leader mode; since there’s preparation, departure is in three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでは、ゆっくり休んでいてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until then, rest well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアがザンスにランスに渡して欲しいとラブレターを渡す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria gives Zhans a love letter to pass on to Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう、いい加減歳なんだから、こんなマネするなよ、とっくに捨てられたのを理解しろよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, you’re getting old, stop doing things like this. Understand that you were discarded long ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と文句を言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She complains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだまだ子供ね、大人の愛は分からないようね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You’re still a child; you don’t understand adult love.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エール女
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Female Eru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、ザンスが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, Zhans appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女になれ宣言
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Declaration: Become my woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※エール男
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Male Eru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その夜、ザンスが現れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That night, Zhans appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酒飲み
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Drinking alcohol.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスと長田君の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Zhans and Nagata-kun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達が行く理由、才能限界値
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reason we are going, the talent limit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一般人は必要無い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ordinary people are not needed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝、出発する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They depart in the morning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーブはスケールの街にある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The orb is in the town of Scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人が魔獣カースの退治を直訴している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Villagers are directly petitioning to exterminate the magical beast Curse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 廃墟となったスケールに到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrive at the ruined town of Scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦争終結を認めない魔軍が立て籠もっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, refusing to accept the war's end, is holed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ザンスは自分がリーダーと思っていたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zhans thought he was the leader,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールがリーダーと知り驚く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but is surprised to learn that Eru is the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最期にはエールをリーダーと認める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, he acknowledges Eru as the leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 街中で立て籠もる魔物将軍ダルソン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Darson is barricaded inside the town.
